00024 std::string SetupNavigator::GetBank(const IDs::channel& src)const{
00025     TSetupData* setup=TSetupData::Instance();
00026     std::map<std::string, std::string>* bankDetNameMap=&setup->fBankToDetectorMap;
00027     for(std::map<std::string, std::string>::iterator it = bankDetNameMap->begin();
00028             it != bankDetNameMap->end(); ++it){
00029         if(modules::parser::iequals(it->second , src.str())) return it->first;
00030     }
00031     return "invalid-det-bank";
00032 }

00034 double SetupNavigator::GetPedestalError(std::string bankname) {
00035 
00036   // The values that we will read in
00037   double noise=definitions::DefaultValue;
00038 
00039   // Get the SQLite database file
00040   TSQLiteServer* server = new TSQLiteServer("sqlite://pedestals-and-noises.sqlite");
00041 
00042   std::stringstream query; 
00043   std::string tablename = "pedestals_and_noises";
00044   int run_number = GetRunNumber(); // get this run number (Note that if we don't have a catalogue of pedestals and noises for each run then we will want to change this)
00045   if (server) {
00046 
00047     query << "SELECT * FROM " << tablename << " WHERE bank=\'" << bankname << "\' AND run=" << run_number << ";"; // get all the pedestals and noises
00048     TSQLiteResult* result = (TSQLiteResult*) server->Query(query.str().c_str());  // get the result of this query
00049     query.str(""); // clear the stringstream after use
00050 
00051     TSQLiteRow* row = (TSQLiteRow*) result->Next(); // get the first row
00052     while (row != NULL) {
00053       noise = atof(row->GetField(4));
00054       
00055       delete row;
00056       row = (TSQLiteRow*) result->Next(); // get the next row
00057     }
00058     delete result; // user has to delete the result
00059   }
00060   else {
00061     std::cout << "Error: Couldn't connect to SQLite database" << std::endl;
00062   }
00063   server->Close();
00064   return noise;
00065 }
00066

00069   // The values that we will read in
00070   double pedestal=definitions::DefaultValue;

00072   // Get the SQLite database file

00078   if (server) {
00079 
00080     query << "SELECT * FROM " << tablename << " WHERE bank=\'" << bankname << "\' AND run=" << run_number << ";"; // get all the pedestals and noises

00083
